title: OCE Shoutcasting
body:
Hi guys!

Wondering about your thoughts on how to become a shoutcaster in OCE. Do I start by doing commentary on pro games or local uni games? Not to blow my own horn but i've been told I have an awesome voice that I should use on radio but this I believe would be way more awesome!

Would love to know your thoughts on this and will be doing doing more research on this by myself.

Cheers guys!

replies.body:
Reach out to smaller tournaments and events (uni games are a great start) and offer to do casting for them. Practice your familiarity with switching between play-by-play and analysis of games in the meantime, and ensure that your game knowledge is at a good level. Playing and casting are very different since you're seeing everything all the time, so recording yourself casting over a VoD is a great way to practice and improve.

Good luck with it!
